props.name: emphasis
props.description: The visual emphasis of the button, corresponds to the 'Emphasis' property in Figma.

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the button, corresponds to the 'Size' property in Figma.

props.name: iconLeft
props.description: Corresponds to the 'Icon-left' property in Figma.

props.name: iconRight
props.description: Corresponds to the 'Icon-right' property in Figma.

props.name: state
props.description: The interactive state of the button, corresponds to the 'State' property in Figma.

props.name: deletable
props.description: Whether the button has a deletable state/icon, corresponds to the 'Deletable' property in Figma.

props.name: label
props.description: The text content displayed inside the button.
